Project.name: PureMVC Standard for Perl
Project.Description: PureMVC is a lightweight framework for creating applications based upon the classic Model-View-Controller design meta-pattern. This is the specific implementation for the Perl language based on the Standard Version AS3 reference.
Project.ReleaseNotes:
Features in Version 1.0
  • First production release, based on AS3 Standard version 2.0.4.
  • Released with complete with Unit Tests and documetation.
Project.Installation:
From the Archive
  • Download the latest source code archive.
  • Unzip the source code zip to any folder on your disk. For instance:
    • c:\development\
  • You will see a PureMVC_Perl_X_Y (where X_Y is version) source folder. For instance:
c:\development\PureMVC_Perl_X_Y From the Repository
  • Use your favorite SVN client to retrieve the latest source code release from the repository.
